DOC.brief_summary: This study intend collect self-reported information multiple survey lifestyle habit , food drink , state mind ( happy , sad , etc . ) trait ( decision making , general personality , etc . ) The purpose study understand relationship self-reported information , game performance , passive physiology measure throughout daily cycle .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Pilot Study Characterize Relationships Between Self-reported Information , Game Performance , Passive Physiology Measures Throughout Daily Cycle
DOC.criteria: Must > =18 year old Must agree participate via electronic consent Must agree share email physical address ( final dataset deidentified ) Must computer and/or smartphone Must member survey panel agree take multiple survey 46 week Must complete full survey fail attention filter Must able access cognition game website play game Must willing wear lifestyle assessment sense device 1 week Known skin reaction allergy metal Known skin reaction allergy medical adhesive Participation another research study , behavior new drug testing
